violations_detected.title: No thank you for waiting after search
violations_detected.evidence: Search announced at 0:00:45.517 ('Сейчас проверю информацию'), completed at ~0:00:59, but agent proceeded directly to question 'Пожалуйста, вам необходимы летние шины или зимние?' without thanking customer for waiting

violations_detected.title: No thank you for waiting after search
violations_detected.evidence: Search announced at 0:01:13.234 ('Сейчас посмотрю, минуту, пожалуйста'), completed at ~0:01:20, then agent asked 'Вам необходима комплекшн, верно я вас поймаю?' without prior thank you

coaching_priorities.issue: Missing thank you after information search
coaching_priorities.recommendation: Always thank customer for waiting after completing any information search, even quick ones. Use phrases like 'Спасибо за ожидание' within 5 seconds of search completion
Optimize search speed. Two instances (at 5:41 and 10:35) had searches lasting 40-45 seconds. While not violations, consider ways to expedite database lookups

7.1.evidence: Proper greeting with company name (74-х колесами), operator name (Алина), and offer to help (Как к вас можно обращаться?). Closing with gratitude (спасибо за звонок) and farewell

7.2.evidence: Phone number 912-615-69-64 was repeated back at 11:56.515 with confirmation request ('верно?') and customer confirmed ('Верно, верно')

7.3.evidence: Intro at 3.316 seconds (< 5s), disconnect at 2.66 seconds (< 5s)

7.4.evidence: No interruptions without apology detected. Agent maintains polite, professional tone throughout

6.1.evidence: Multiple searches conducted (longest ~54s). At 4:34-5:04 approx 30s silence with one search on boundary. Customer remains engaged, does not hang up despite wait times. No critical silence with customer hangup
6.1.note: Two searches in 40-45s flag window (5:41 and 10:35), but customer did not disconnect

9.1.evidence: Most searches under 40s. Two searches at boundary: 44.81s (5:41-6:26) and 43.18s (10:35-11:18) fall in 40-45s flag window only. All other searches 0-30s
9.1.note: Two searches in flag window - improvement needed but no score reduction per rule

9.3.evidence: Search at 0:45-0:59: No thank you before proceeding to tire type question. Search at 1:13-1:20: No thank you before proceeding to completion question
9.3.note: Later searches included thank you, but these early searches violated requirement

3.1.evidence: Customer's tire purchase request fully addressed with specific product, pricing, options. Trade-in questions escalated to manager appropriately. Installation location provided (partner at Волгоградская 208). Order confirmed with order number 96-97-64
3.1.note: Minor unclear point about tire size compatibility (205 vs 215) properly escalated for manager callback

3.3.evidence: Phone number for partner location (7-904-174-4111) provided, which is public business information. No internal codes, passwords, or confidential data disclosed

3.6.evidence: Agent consistently uses verification phrases ('Сейчас посмотрю', 'проверю информацию') before providing factual information about products and services

5.1.evidence: Customer name (Сергей), phone (912-615-69-64), tire specifications (215-60-R-16 Yokohama), pricing (9670 and 10590 rubles), order number (96-97-64), and mount location all provided

10.2.evidence: Information provided in logical flow: tire options → specifications → pricing → delivery/mounting details → order confirmation. Script structure maintained throughout

10.3.evidence: Professional dialogue maintained. Agent addresses customer concerns methodically, clarifies uncertainty about tire compatibility, manages escalation to manager properly. Professional opening and closing
10.3.note: Customer name usage unclear from transcript, but overall dialogue quality high

10.6.evidence: Complete and accurate product information delivered: tire models (Yokohama ASGORE IG65, ASGOS IG55), prices, warranty details, benefits (free mounting, trade-in, fuel discount). Confident presentation

2.1.evidence: Call completed successfully with order placed. No refusal of service. Professional closing: 'спасибо за звонок. Всего доброго, до свидания'

1.1.evidence: No profanity or harsh language detected in transcript. Operator maintains professional, polite tone throughout entire call

4.1.evidence: Customer is engaged but somewhat talkative with detailed questions. Agent adapts calmly, addresses each concern. Text shows no frustration indicators
4.1.note: Full assessment limited to text-based indicators; audio tone assessment deferred to Phase 3

positive_observations: Professional greeting with all required elements (company, operator name, offer to help)
Echo method correctly applied to phone number with explicit confirmation
Excellent product knowledge with detailed tire specifications and pricing
Properly managed customer uncertainty by escalating compatibility question to manager
Provided alternative solutions when customer's needs couldn't be immediately met (partner location)
Polite, patient handling of customer's detailed questions and concerns
Proper call timing (intro and disconnect within 5-second rule)
Successfully completed order with confirmation number and proper closing
Multiple safety measures: manager callback scheduled, SMS confirmation sent

data_quality.confidence_notes: Transcript quality sufficient for criteria assessment. Word-level JSON timestamps available for echo method detection. Some transcription variations in technical terms (tire models) but context clear
